name: 3dGetrow
author: AFNI Developers
description: Program to extract 1 row from a dataset and write it as a .1D file

inputs.description: Extract row along the x-direction at fixed y-index of j and fixed z-index of k
inputs.name: X direction row extraction

inputs.description: Extract row along the y-direction at fixed x-index of i and fixed z-index of k
inputs.name: Y direction row extraction

inputs.description: Extract row along the z-direction at fixed x-index of i and fixed y-index of j
inputs.name: Z direction row extraction

inputs.description: Read input from dataset 'ddd' (instead of putting dataset name at end of command line)
inputs.name: Input File

inputs.description: Filename for output .1D ASCII file will be 'ff' (if 'ff' is '-', then output is to stdout, the default)
inputs.name: Output File
